profile.name: Nuwan C. Perera
profile.title: Senior Software Engineer
profile.bio: Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience specializing in backend systems using PHP (Symfony, Laravel), Python, and Linux scripting. Proven track record in building real-time monitoring tools, VoIP integration (CUCM via AXL/SXL), and automating subnet scanning with SNMP. Strong advocate of SOLID, TDD, DDD, and CI/CD. Adept at designing scalable microservices and infrastructure-aware applications in enterprise-grade environments.

workExperience.title: Senior Software Engineer
workExperience.subtitle: Synergy Systems Pvt Ltd
description: Led the design and development of a plugin framework for a  Symfony monitoring system using micro-frontend and microservice architecture, enabling extensibility of the existing system. This centralized over 10 features and improved release cycles by more than 40%.

Architected and developed a monitoring module for 5,000+ VoIP phones across multiple Cisco CUCM clusters using AXL/SXL APIs. Exposed real-time device and network status via React-based dashboards, improving monitoring system productivity by 10%.

Led and enhanced a legacy subnet scanning method in the monitoring system by developing it as an installable module, supporting multiple scanning providers such as SNMP and ESXi using an event-driven architecture with high modularity. This reduced initial setup workload by over 30% and improved client experience by more than 10%.
Engineered a custom RHEL repository for multiple binaries required by the monitoring system, significantly reducing the workload during initial setup.

workExperience.title: Senior Application Developer
workExperience.subtitle: Intervest Technologies Pvt Ltd
description: Implemented a logging subsystem and an environment-based content comparison tool within a Laravel package, enhancing debugging capabilities for QA and developers and improving productivity by 15%.
Led the design and development of a manual policy renewal subsystem for a travel insurance solution, ensuring backward compatibility, modular architecture, and adherence to SOLID principles.
Contributed to a Laravel package used as a white-label solution for travel insurance, following TDD, semantic versioning, and best practices to ensure minimal downtime and maintainability.

workExperience.title: Senior Application Developer

description: Engineered a custom portal for a Purchasing Order System for a supply company, significantly improving their productivity.
Led the development of an intranet application using Flutter, which contributed to a substantial revenue increase for a consulting firm.
Skilled in API development using Postman and PHP unit testing, with experience in test automation using Selenium.
Proficient in Laravel package development, WordPress plugin creation, and theme development.
